item.title: Callie's Corner
item.description:
Once again, Callie takes some of the photos found on our computer monitors (usually enjoyed by all and rarely having anything to do with dentistry), and gives a little background info.

One of our dental assistants, Lindsay, has a heart for the canine world. Today, we want to introduce the newest adoptee in Lindsay's family. It is a seven month old dachshund/miniature pincher mix. She was rescued from a dog ranch in Arkansas. What Lindsay was doing in Arkansas, well, you'll have to ask her. The new pet was named by Lindsay's daughter, Rhiannon. The adoption took place a week before Halloween, so Rhiannon named her "Pumpkin", a rather creative name we think.

Pumpkin's favorite hobbies are chewing bones, playing with her squeaky toys and snuggling. We haven't examined her teeth and gums yet, but she sounds like a great addition to Lindsay's family.

Tags: 
callie’s corner
pets
dog
item.dc:creator: Dr. Inge
